name: Incomplete (Edwin Ho)
description:
Incomplete is a fast-paced endless runner where the player is on a quest to find more edges to become complete.

Controls:
Drag or swipe to create edge chains to bounce the player.
Collect hearts and avoid hazards.

Created by:
Artist: Virginia Kitchen
Programmer: Roger Dalke
Programmer: Tyler Gemora
Programmer: Andrew Chau
Programmer: Edwin Ho
